name: F01201
value: Shields children from wind, rain, snow, and sun. The height adjusts with the handlebar, and the partial opening and built-in sunshade offer airflow and comfort on warmer days.

name: F01201
value: This lockable cover shields up to 240 L of cargo from the elements. Made from folding polypropylene, it opens easily for quick loading and unloading.

name: F01201
value: Made from durable EPP, the high, lockable cover protects up to 375 L of cargo. The low loading height keeps access quick and easy.

name: F01201
value: The durable tarpaulin keeps cargo clean and dry in any weather. It can be half or fully rolled back, letting children ride comfortably while staying protected.

name: F01201
value:
The Buggy option makes family transport easy and secure. Half-height side walls and a step let kids climb in and out with ease, while the sturdy aluminium frame and polypropylene roof offer extra protection — even in a collision. The water-repellent cover avoids PVC and includes tinted windows, roll-up sides, and a rear panel to shield against wind and rain.

Max load: 70 kg. Please check local laws before transporting children by bike.

name: F01201
value: Modular polypropylene elements let you customise the space to suit your load. Configure up to three compartments, use the flat surface, or secure Euro boxes with built-in holders and side pockets. Four eyelets allow for extra straps when carrying taller cargo.

name: F01201
value:
Double Child Seat with Front Luggage Shelf – Flexible for family and cargo.
Seats two children up to age seven with five-point belts and recycled headrests. The seat folds up for extra space. The front shelf holds a crate-sized load when down, or acts as a table with foot space when up. The 47 L food-safe box fits neatly on the rack or in a shopping trolley.

<sub>Check local regulations before transporting children</sub>

name: F01201
value:
Comfortably seats two children up to age seven, with adjustable sitting and sleeping positions. Five-point harnesses keep them secure, and the headrest — made from 100% recycled material — folds flat when not in use. Need more space? Just fold up the seat to carry larger loads.

Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.

name: F01201
value: The glove compartment lock means small items are safely stowed away. The lock uses the same key as the battery lock and Abus frame lock and replaces the standard magnetic closure.

name: F01201
value:
Carry up to three children (age seven or younger) with secure five-point belts and recycled headrests. The third seat folds down for cargo space, or all seats can be folded to free up even more room.

<sub>Check local regulations before transporting children by bike.</sub>

name: F01201
F01201
value: RX Connect takes your riding experience to a new level. You can completely secure your bike with the standard, integrated RX Chip and the RX Service to go along with it. Activate ConnectRide Free for one year free of charge: the RX Connect app shows the location of your bike, offers a digital motion alarm and automatically records rides with extensive riding statistics.

name: F01201
value: The Packster2 70 handles like a pro — smooth to steer, simple to park, and easy to hop on and off. Its cable steering lets you glide through tight spots, even fully loaded. Need more space? The rear carrier adds room for up to 27 kg of extra cargo.

name: F01201
value: The EPP transport box is fully recyclable and made with zero emissions. Optional child seats include five-point belts and side-impact protection for peace of mind. Add the buggy kit for easy access with half-height side walls — all within a tough frame that supports the weather cover and shields your passengers.

name: F01201
value: A powerful headlight with daytime running light and well-placed reflectors keeps you visible at all times. The optional Bosch ABS and Magura disc brakes add extra stopping power and control — preventing skids and slips, even in sudden stops.

name: F01201
value: With swept-back handlebars and a wide saddle, the Comfort Kit lets you ride in a relaxed, upright position — perfect for cruising in comfort.

name: F01201
value: With a massive 1,500 Wh of power, Riese & Müller’s DualBattery tech delivers double the range, fewer charging stops, and the freedom to take on bigger adventures — or just forget about range altogether in daily life.

name: F01201
value: Track fitness, pair with heart rate monitors via Bluetooth, and navigate without maps when linked to your phone. The Kiox 300 puts training insights and ride control right at your fingertips — all operated through the intuitive LED Remote.

name: F01201
value: Tackle rough terrain with Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus tires. A wide centre tread keeps you rolling fast, while aggressive side lugs grip hard in corners. Plus, a 3 mm puncture guard adds tough protection where it counts.

name: F01201
value: Designed for up to 5 kg per side, this sleek rack keeps your panniers secure without adding bulk. Rear and brake lights are seamlessly built in — a clean look with smart function.

name: F01201
value: With powerful Tektro TRP C 2.3 brakes, premium Supernova lighting, and a suspension seatpost, the Performance Kit delivers serious control, comfort, and confidence. Brake harder, see further, and ride smoother — even under heavy loads.

name: F01201
value:
Components

The Packster2 70 touring in detail

Frame colour chili matt*; urban grey matt*; white*
Suspension fork Suntour Mobie 34 CGO Boost, 20", 80mm
Rear shock X-Fusion Glyde*

Seatclamp JD, 40,0 mm, QR
Tires Schwalbe Big Ben Plus 55-406 Reflex; Schwalbe Super Moto-X 62-559 Reflex; Schwalbe 20" Smart Sam Plus 60-406 ECE-R75*; Schwalbe Smart Sam Plus 57-559 Reflex*
Tubes Schwalbe AV13; Schwalbe AV7
Rims Mach1 Trucky30 20" CNC; Mach1 Trucky30 26" CNC
Spokes Sapim Leader 2,0 mm, Inox, black
Front hub Novatec Boost Cargo Disc 32H
Rear hub Novatec Boost, Disc, QR, 36H
Battery Akku Bosch Powertube 750 Vertical
Motor Bosch Cargo Line (smart system)
Display Bosch Intuvia 100; Bosch Kiox 300*

Chain ring 42T
Chain guard Chain guard
Chain KMC X11
Cassette Shimano CUES CS-LG400-11,11-50T
Saddle Selle Royal New Lookin Male Eco; Selle Royal New Lookin Female Eco*

Shifting system Shimano CUES RD-U8000 11-S
Shifter Shimano XT 11-S Linkglide
Handlebar Satori Horizon, 31.8 mm, 9°, B=620 mm; Satori Noirette Plus, 31.8 mm, Alu*
Stem Satori, 60 mm, +/-17°
Grips Ergon ergonomic

Front light Supernova mini 2; Supernova M99 Mini Pro-25*
Tail light Busch & Müller Toplight 2C LED; Supernova M99, integrated brake light*
Mudguards SKS A69R

Rubber Bibia
Bell Billy

Lock ABUS Shield X+; ABUS Rahmenschlosskette 130 cm*
RX Hardware RX Chip (für RX Services)*
Frame size [cm] universal*

The specification table indicates all available components for this model – not just the basic equipment. Some of the options listed are only available for a surcharge. For more information, see the Configurator. Riese & Müller reserves the right to make technical modifications as well as changes to the shape, colour and/or weight within reasonable limits.

* May differ depending on the availability in your country, design or configuration of the model.

name: F01200
value:
The 130 cm Abus chain lock pairs with the frame lock for added protection — tough 6 mm links that secure your bike to fixed objects or lock multiple bikes together. One key fits the frame, chain, and battery locks. The lock stows in a Vaude saddle bag made from 100% recycled polyester, with a roll-top design for quick, easy access.

Note: May limit saddle height on smaller frames.

name: F01200
value: Stay firmly in the saddle, even under hard braking. On asphalt or gravel, ABS 2.0 prevents skids, rear wheel lift, and sideways slips — for safer, more confident stops in any situation.
